description: WOW! INCREDIBLE PRICE FOR OVER 2000 SQ FT! This fantastic 4-bdrm/4-bath townhouse offers breathtaking views of Kanaka Creek Park & Thornhill. The bright, open-concept main floor is filled with natural light from oversized windows, creating a warm & inviting space ideal for everyday living & entertaining. Enjoy seamless indoor-outdoor living with private patios overlooking serene park views. The top floor features 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, including a luxurious 5-piece ensuite & walk-in closet. The lower level boasts soaring ceilings, ample storage, an additional bedroom, & full bathroom. This versatile space is ideal for a media room, guest suite, teenager hangout, or even co-owning or co-sharing opportunities. Located steps from walking trails, Kanaka Creek Elementary & transit
